page.title: 02Airport Development.
page.content: For many years now the people living in the picturesque villages around the airport have been content to accept minor development due to social change and needs.Their worries and fears have now been aroused by the prospective plans to develop its local airport. Many of the local residents now find themselves worried as to its expansion and are fighting to protect their countryside. On the other hand there are people who welcome this venture. Almost every week{local newspaper editions have predominent features expressing resident's views and opinions. During the first week of June,1985, news was released that {Stansted {Airport}was to be developed as {London's Third Airport.
